name: Html Minifier
tagline: A simple command line tool to minify your HTML, Razor views & Web Forms views
body:
A simple command line tool to minify your HTML, Razor views & Web Forms views. By minifying your HTML on bigger web pages, you will save on bytes that your users need to download. Less bytes equal faster web pages & faster web pages equal happy users! Go from HTML that looks like this:

Admin Menu

  • @Html.ActionLink("Edit blog entries", "List", "Admin")
  • @Html.ActionLink("View Comments", "CommentList", "Admin")
  • @Html.ActionLink("Clear Cache", "ClearCache", "Admin")
To HTML that looks like this:

Admin Menu

  • @Html.ActionLink("Edit blog entries", "List", "Admin")
  • @Html.ActionLink("View Comments", "CommentList", "Admin")
  • @Html.ActionLink("Clear Cache", "ClearCache", "Admin")
For more information, check out the blog post on my [site](http://www.deanhume.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
